ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was assisted through participation in Mathematical Modeling of Virus Zoonoses Investigative Workshop at the National Institute for Mathematical and Biological Synthesis, sponsored by the National Science Foundation, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security and the U.S. Department of Agriculture through NSF Award #EF‐0832858, with additional support from The University of Tennessee, Knoxville. The research of LJSA and CBJ is partially supported by a grant from the Fogarty International Center #R01TW006986‐02 under the NIH NSF Ecology of Infectious Diseases initiative. The research of VLB is partially supported by a grant from the National Science Foundation DEB‐0917853. The research of PvdD is partially supported by MITACS and NSERC. We thank the reviewers for their helpful suggestions.
